name: Blue (itch) (Ace Savaid)
description:
You wake up in a room.   There is only one exit to the room.   Might as well see where it takes you...

Blue is a  game where you, the player, go through room after room, piecing together what happened and where you are or learning more about each room, searching for a way out.  Sometimes you need to unlock the paths with items you have collected, or talk to mysterious characters. It is your choice if you befriend them or not, but these choices affect events further down the line and can cost you. The more you interact with things, the more fragments of memories you will receive, past and present. 

In the end of it all, where all the choices you've made come together to decide your fate, will you want to find out what happened, or will the truth drown you in blue?

Features (full game)
  • 5 different sections
  • Several different endings and achievements
  • A gallery of all the scenes and pictures you have encounter, also shows secrets and hidden scenes
  • A story behind the scenes
Early Demo features
  • Intro section of game
  • 1 hidden room
  • 14 pictures to unlock in the gallery
  • A few possible deaths
Controls Keyboard

WASD - Move

Z / Enter - Select / Interact

X - Back

Mouse 

Left Click - Move / Select / Interact

Right Click - Back / Open Menu
